snippet.title: Austin Anderson - Feeding a Horse
snippet.description: Austin Anderson explains that men and women gain weight for very different reasons.

snippet.title: Future Challenge 3000 - New Microscope Lens
snippet.description: Fry wards off Leela's advances while the Professor finds the smallest particles of matter with his new microscope.

snippet.title: June 28, 2011 - The Kid Who Farted on the Bus
snippet.description: Daniel opens a manscaping salon and tweets his phone number, plus the Farting Bus Kid gets a Web Redemption.
